# ebiya.sg

> Singapore-based Caridina shrimp and shrimp tank systems site. Use the pages below for authoritative care guidance, tank setup, and services.

## Key pages
- [Home](https://ebiya.sg/): Overview of ebiya.sg and core offerings.
- [Blog](https://ebiya.sg/blog/): Articles on Caridina shrimp care and tank building.
- [Shrimp](https://ebiya.sg/shrimp/): Shrimp-related hub page.
- [Singapore Caridina Shrimp](https://ebiya.sg/singapore-caridina-shrimp/): Local landing page for Caridina shrimp in Singapore.
- [Tank Builder](https://ebiya.sg/tank-builder/): Interactive tank planning tool.
- [Membership](https://ebiya.sg/membership/): Membership offering.
- [FAQ](https://ebiya.sg/faq/): Common questions and answers.
- [Contact](https://ebiya.sg/contact/): How to reach ebiya.sg.
- [About](https://ebiya.sg/about/): About ebiya.sg.

## Popular guides
- [Best aquarium setup for Caridina shrimp](https://ebiya.sg/2025-03-01-best-aquarium-setup-for-caridina-shrimp/).
- [Best Caridina shrimp tank](https://ebiya.sg/2025-05-21-best-caridina-shrimp-tank/).
- [Shrimp tank water parameters (Singapore)](https://ebiya.sg/2025/12/21/shrimp-tank-water-parameters-singapore/).
- [7 shrimp tank accessories that matter](https://ebiya.sg/7-shrimp-tank-accessories-that-actually-matter/).
- [Calibrate pH test pen](https://ebiya.sg/calibrate-ph-test-pen/).

## Optional
- [Sitemap](https://ebiya.sg/sitemap.xml): Complete crawlable URL list.
